alert.note: Alert for Oglethorpe; Taliaferro; Wilkes (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 8:57AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Taliaferro, Wilkes and southeastern Oglethorpe Counties through 930 AM EDT... At 857 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Rayle, or 9 miles northwest of Washington, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Washington, Tignall, Rayle, Sharon, Jacksons Crossroads, Ficklin, Mallorysville, Lundberg, Metasville, Floral Hill, Aonia, Newtown, Danburg, Rocky Creek Fire Dept., Celeste, Raytown and Sandy Cross. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
